segments.text: I have something really cool to tell you about ! Do you know anything about online auctions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're awesome ! I was browsing through the eBay auction today , and I found the cutest fat little copper Buddha ! It's over a hundred years old .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please don't tell me you bought it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you did , you probably got ripped off .
segments.speaker: S2
